title.narrative: Red Cross Denmark - NGO call Horn of Africa - Kenya - 2021-20252220-20255

description.narrative: The project seeks to contribute to build longer-term resillience in marginalised areas, provide access to services, in particular primary health including protection from SGBV and MHPSS services, and promote rights for those affected by displacement whose vulnerabilities have been exacerbated by COVID-19.
FL §06.39.03.11 Other contributions to acute and prolonged crises
